overview: Skin Pleasure is a video essay that investigates the different functions of the skin in relation to the reception of internet pornography. Juxtaposing found footage - like amateur porn, ASMR videos and other web-based body genres - with close-ups of the filmmakers' body, Skin Pleasure is a highly reflective and at the same time deeply personal exploration of our bodily engagement with online media.
title: Skin Pleasure
